declarations.comments:
This is just a playground for a HTTP validation
In http query every key can be repeated
and can have form:
?key ~ (Nothing) or ?key= ~ (Just "") or ?key=v1 ~ (Just "v1")
declarations.title: QueryField

declarations.comments: This is just (tok → a → m b)
declarations.title: Builder

declarations.comments:
Aggregate validation results.

To simplify final result extraction
it passes two types of result:

* just `unwraped` resulting value

* valid value wrapped in `Right` so it can
  be easily turned into invalid value

i, i' - invalid result types
v, v' - valid result types
declarations.title: RecordBuilder

declarations.comments:
I is just (a → m (Either e b)) but those transformers
give us so many things for free...
declarations.title: Validation
